changes.change: Fixed CS:GO AGR weapon export potentially not working correctly and mirv_fix oldDuckFix not working or crashing due to copy and paste mistake.
Fixed mirv_camimport start not working under some conditions, i.e. when demo was un-paused and not re-playing when jumping back in time.
Added console warnings to cam import commands when they already fail upon reading the file header.
Changed drawHud defaults for normal and baseFx stream templates to -1 (means game default), all other templates have drawHud 0. This restores the old behavior from several months ago.
Fixed drawHud preview not working.
Other fixes.
Made RTTI based hooks more stable against updates.
Re-added support for https://mmhud.spddl.de/ for old SclaeformUI (needs -scaleform in launch options).

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Adjusted to CS:GO 7/25/2018.

release.comments: If you modded Panorama UI with HLAE, don't forget to delete panorama.my.zip and to reapply your changes: https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/wiki/How-to-change-Panorama-UI

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Adjusted to CS:GO 7/24/2018 (1.36.4.3)

release.comments: If you modded Panorama UI with HLAE, don't forget to delete panorama.my.zip and to reapply your changes: https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/wiki/How-to-change-Panorama-UI

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Adjusted to CS:GO 7/18/2018.

release.comments: If you modded Panorama UI with HLAE, don't forget to delete panorama.my.zip and to reapply your changes: https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/wiki/How-to-change-Panorama-UI

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Added support code to accompany mirv_panorama_toggledebugger in order to avoid mouse state problems.

release.comments: A tutorial for mirv_panorama_toggledebugger usage is in the works.

changes.change: Added mirv_panorama_toggledebugger - This command is not officially supported by us, it may or may not work. Please note the debugger won't save changes until the paths in csgo/panorama/ are present. Also please note that the changes won't be live in next load, until you package them and tell HLAE to make CS:GO use them (See HLAE 2.52.0 (2018-07-11T16:48Z) / AfxHookSource 1.42.0 (2018-07-11T16:48Z).)
Adjusted to CS:GO 7/13/2018.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Adjusted to CS:GO 7/11/2018 (1.36.4.1).

release.comments:
Thanks to https://twitter.com/ThatNWP for testing.
If you already modded PanoramaUI, don't forget to reapply your changes to the latest panorama.org.zip (there were quite some changes).

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change:
Added -afxDetourPanorama (case sensitive!) command line option, which allows to modify Panorama UI.
When the game is loaded with the Panorama UI, this will create a panorama.org.zip in the HLAE.exe folder.
Extract the panorama folder in it with 7z ( https://www.7-zip.org/ ) and make your changes.
Then use 7z, create a new ZIP archive named panorama.my.zip with the folder: right click the panorama folder, Add To Archive, select format zip, select compression level store, and insert these in the Parameters box: x=0 m=Copy cp=20127 tc- cl- cu- tc-
Then hit okay and let it create the ZIP file and restart the game (still with -afxDetourPanorama option).

release.comments: Thanks to https://twitter.com/ChetdeJong for testing.

changes.change: Fixed multiple bugs in mirv_deathmsg.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change:
Adjusted (again) to CS:GO 7/6/2018 (version 1.36.4.0).
Now automatically detects if ScaleformUI or PanoramaUI and should work with both.

release.comments:
ATTENTION, the ScaleformUI update now uses the new interface for mirv_deathmsg and mirv_replace_name, which replicate again bellow for your convenience:
Readded mirv_deathmsg, the interface changed, but it has all features it used to have (even more, i.e. every id can be userID or XUID of a player, also trace (userId) or xTrace (XUID) to use current POV, see mirv_deathmsg help id for more info).
Examples:
1) mirv_deathmsg fake attackerId=4 victimId=5 weapon=ak47 headshot=1 // will make a death notice for the player with userID 4 killing the player with userId 5 with an headshot from ak47, will only work if one death message has been shown already.
2) mirv_deathmsg localPlayer xTrace // sets the current POV player as localPlayer by their XUID.
3) mirv_deathmsg lifeTime 100.5 // sets the next default death notice life time to 100.5 seconds, to clear notices jump back to i.e. round start.
4) mirv_deathmsg lifeTimeMod 1.0 // sets the next default death notice life time multiplier for local player time 1.
5) mirv_deathmsg lifeTimeMod default // Restores default life time multiplier.
6) mirv_deathmsg filter add attackerMatch=!xTrace victimMatch=!xTrace block=1 lastRule=1 // block all death messages except of the player by XUID in the current POV.
Readded mirv_replace_name, the interface changed, but it has all features it used to have (even more, i.e. every id can be userID or XUID of a player, also trace (userId) or xTrace (XUID) to use current POV, see mirv_replace_name help id for more info).
Known problems:
mirv_streams preview drawHud will always draw the PanoramaUI HUD on the full screen, if it hasn't been drawn yet: https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/issues/60

changes.change: Fixed mirv_deathmsg crash / adjusted to CS:GO update 6/25/18 (1.36.3.9).

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change:
Readded mirv_deathmsg, the interface changed, but it has all features it used to have (even more, i.e. every id can be userID or XUID of a player, also trace (userId) or xTrace (XUID) to use current POV, see mirv_deathmsg help id for more info).
Examples:
1) mirv_deathmsg fake attackerId=4 victimId=5 weapon=ak47 headshot=1 // will make a death notice for the player with userID 4 killing the player with userId 5 with an headshot from ak47, will only work if one death message has been shown already.
2) mirv_deathmsg localPlayer xTrace // sets the current POV player as localPlayer by their XUID.
3) mirv_deathmsg lifeTime 100.5 // sets the next default death notice life time to 100.5 seconds, to clear notices jump back to i.e. round start.
4) mirv_deathmsg lifeTimeMod 1.0 // sets the next default death notice life time multiplier for local player time 1.
5) mirv_deathmsg lifeTimeMod default // Restores default life time multiplier.
6) mirv_deathmsg filter add attackerMatch=!xTrace victimMatch=!xTrace block=1 lastRule=1 // block all death messages except of the player by XUID in the current POV.

Readded mirv_replace_name, the interface changed, but it has all features it used to have (even more, i.e. every id can be userID or XUID of a player, also trace (userId) or xTrace (XUID) to use current POV, see mirv_replace_name help id for more info).

release.comments:
Known problems:
mirv_streams preview drawHud will always draw the PanoramaUI HUD on the full screen, if it hasn't been drawn yet: https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/issues/60

changes.change: Fixed mirv_streams and other features not working on 6/19/2018 version 1.36.3.9 CS:GO #PanoramaUI branch.
Temporarily removed mirv_deathmsg features (we are trying to bring them back, but it's unsure to which extend it is possible.
Added possibility to use * as argument instead of a value in mirv_input position / mirv_input angles, which means do not change that component / value.
Fixed mirv_pgl websocket not sending data when recording or multi-preview.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed a few bugs (i.e. mirv_calcs edit vecAng edit nor working correctly for value calc rotation properties.) and typos.
Updated to Microsoft Visual Studio 2017 version 15.7.3 and updated uCRT/CRT DLLs. OpenEXR libraries updated to 2.2.1 version. Rebuild.

release.comments: HLAE team member Dec added a HLAE manual entry for mirv_calcs, you can find it here: https://github.com/advancedfx/advancedfx/wiki/Source%3Amirv_calcs

changes.change: Added mirv_loadlibrary command.

Adjusted to CS:GO update for 5/21/18 (1.36.3.6):
Fixed error mirv_streams sound recording not working.
Removed mirv_fix playerAnimState console spam.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed bugs in mirv_calcs and mirv_camio.
Added mirv_calcs cam (cam (camio camera) and game (game view camera) calc) calcs.
Added mirv_calcs vecAng cam (uses the location and rotation of a cam calc) calc.
Added mirv_calcs fov cam (uses the FOV of a cam calc) calc.
Added mirv_cam fov - can be used to set a fov calc.

release.comments:
This should allow various live camera effects:
// Example config:
// Offset from player on spectator key 1:
//
mirv_calcs cam add cam cam test.cam current // (test.cam should be a mirv_camio cam file in local space)
mirv_calcs fov add cam cam cam
mirv_calcs vecAng add cam cam cam
mirv_calcs handle add key key 1
mirv_calcs vecAng add handleEye keyEye key
mirv_calcs vecAng add offset keyCam keyEye cam 1
mirv_cam source calcVecAng keyCam
mirv_cam fov calc cam // Use fov of camio
// Example config:
// Offset from game camera (use i.e. to add camera shake data live):
//
mirv_calcs cam add cam cam test.cam current // (test.cam should be a mirv_camio cam file in local space)
mirv_calcs cam add game game
mirv_calcs vecAng add cam cam cam
mirv_calcs vecAng add cam game game
mirv_calcs vecAng add offset gameCam game cam 1
mirv_cam source calcVecAng gameCam
mirv_cam fov calcClear // don't override fov
// To restart the path use this:
mirv_calcs cam edit cam startTime current

changes.change: Fixed engine memory (functor) leak in mirv_streams baseFx based streams caused by HLAE.
Fixed smoke overlay alpha factor state problems caused by HLAE (mostly had an impact on FPS inside smokes when using HLAE live).

Adjusted to CS:GO update 4/30/18 (5/1/18 UTC, 1.36.3.3):
Fixed error in addresses.cpp / mirv_streams sound recording not working .
Fixed mirv_streams queue state problems (could cause wrong sky box depth color scaling in depth streams and problems with entity handle detection).

Adjusted to CS:GO update 4/20/18 (4/21/18 UTC, 1.36.3.2):
Fixed mirv_streams sound recording not working .

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed mirv_cvar_unhide_all not working anymore in CS:GO.

release.comments:
Thanks to:
- https://github.com/PcDivision

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed basic general features (campath / mirv_input camera) not working in Alien Swarm and Left 4 Dead 2.

release.comments:
Thanks for helping with testing to:
- https://twitter.com/Devomvm

changes.change:
Adjusted to CS:GO update 3/29/2018 (1.36.3.1):
Fixed mirv_streams sound recording not working (related to error in addresses.cpp:334). Since Valve fixed the surround sound with the CS:GO update, it's also possible to properly record surround sound with mirv_streams again.
Fixed mirv_campath not loading FOV interp setting.
Fixed mirv_streams stream picker locking up.
Fixed small memory leak when using mirv_streams (tracker class for materials was not freed when material was released).

Updated mirv_streams picker to print intermediate results when current picking mode has determined the intermediate result (depending on the mode / results you can still continue picking with another mode).
Added more options to mirv_listentites (sorting by distance and filtering by entity class), enter mirv_listentites and see the end of the output for more info.
Added mirv_traceentity, traces entity from current view position (middle of the screen), ignores "local player" (self).
Fixed mirv_streams stream picker not working properly, this should bring slight performance improvements and reduce memory footprint and fragmentation a bit for streams.

Adjusted to CS:GO update 2/28/2018 (1.36.2.8):
Fixed mirv_streams sound recording not working (related to error in addresses.cpp:263).

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change:
Added mirv_campath edit anchor - allows to easily edit the campath position and rotation using an reference anchor and an destination.
Example: To use keyframe 0 as anchor and thus make the campath start from the current camera position use: mirv_campath edit anchor #0 current

release.comments:
Greetings:
- https://twitter.com/spczf

changes.change: Fixed AGR recording in TF2 and CSSV34, thanks to https://twitter.com/frostleanMan for helping with that!
Added player info display (XUID, name, UserID, GUID) to mirv_listentites for player entities.
Added isPlayer=1 option to mirv_listentites so it only displays player entities.

Updated mirv_deathmsg, now you can optionally specify an XUID (prefix with x) as an ID to the command (no prefix = UserID), see mirv_deathmsg help id for more details. The advantage of an XUID is that it won't change with an reconnect, this feature has mainly been added as convenience feature to support the csgo-demos-manager.com movie mode.

Adjusted to CS:GO update 2/15/2018 (1.36.2.7):
Fixed mirv_streams sound recording not working (related to error in addresses.cpp:263).

Added mirv_streams stream property forceBuildingCubemaps, which is 0 (off) for normal stream and 1 (on) on all other stream classes and templates by default.
When forceBuildingCubemaps is 1 or implied to 1 by mirv_streams (see bellow), then this disables dynamic tone-mapping and glow change filtering and other effects that depend on the previous state.
Added mirv_streams move, which can be used to change the order of streams.

Updated mirv_streams:
- matPostprocessEnable, matDynamicTonemapping, matMotionBlurEnabled, matForceTonemapScale are -1 by default now, which means try to use game defaults whenever possible. Please note you might still want to set matForceTonemapScale to a value between 1.0 and 2.0 in order to fix random bomb plant brightness (if required), but that will disable dynamic brightness of course.
- For the first stream rendered (recorded / previewed) it obeys forceBuildingCubemaps, for all other streams it renders as if forceBuildingCubemaps is 1. Recorded streams are rendered first, before the preview(s) are rendered, previews are rendered in order of their preview slot number.
The idea behind this change is to allow having the ability to have a normal stream rendered first that represents the original game view, including dynamic brightness and glow filtering.
Example:
mirv_streams add normal myNormal
mirv_streams edit myNormal drawHud -1 // enable HUD according to game defaults
mirv_streams move myNormal 0 // move it to the begin of the list, in case other streams have been rendered already.
Various internal fixes and improvements.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed mirv_streams smokeOverlayAlphaFactor stream property not working properly (in preview / when having mutliple streams recorded).
Fixed mirv_agr not working properly in CSSV34 / CS:GO.

release.comments:
Greetings:
- https://twitter.com/SPestrux
- https://twitter.com/CSGODemoManager
- You :-)

changes.change:
Adjusted to CS:GO update 1/29/2018 (1.36.2.4):
Fixed mirv_streams sound recording not working.
Fixed bug in mirv_streams that could cause incorrect render state (i.e. green ragdolls on greenscreen).
Fixed crash bug when previewing while recording mirv_streams, due to mistake in new code. Thanks to https://twitter.com/danielhagelin for reporting it and narrowing it down.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change:
Adjusted to 1/19/2018 CS:GO update:
Fixed mirv_streams sound recording not working.

release.comments:
While this version still contains the AfxHookSource 1.35.0 mirv_streams multi preview feature, we recommend to only use slot 0 for previewing (1x1 grid), except if you can deal with the following known problems:
- HUD will only work properly in the top left slot, so if HUD is drawn in any other preview slot, there will be problems.
- Reflections, i.e. in water are very inaccurate if using other slots than 0.

changes.change:
Updated mirv_streams:
- updated: preview and previewEnd, now optionally accept a slot number between 0 (bottom right) and 15 (top left), to allow previewing multiple streams (will switch automatically between 1x1 / 2x2 / 4x4 grid according to highest slot used).
- added previewSuspend 0|1: allows to remporarily suspend the preview, without removing all streams from preview
- updated preview: Will accurately reflect drawViewmodel now. For technical reasons the drawHud setting can currently only be reflected properly if there is only 1 stream with HUD to be drawn and no streams are being recorded or if the grid is 1x1 only.
Fixed AGR bugs: Certain demos with bots should work now, hopefully also broken bone data on 3rd person weapon world models is fixed now.
Updated mirv_streams internally (changes are hopefully mostly transparent to the user, appart from bug fixes).
Fixed several mirv_streams bugs.
Extended possible values for drawViewmodel (new default -1) and drawHud (default unchanged at 0) mirv_streams stream properties: -1 = no change, 0 = don't draw, 1 = draw.

Adjusted to 11/8/2017 CS:GO update:
Fixed mirv_streams sound recording not working.

Adjusted to 10/31/2017 CS:GO update:
Fixed mirv_streams sound recording not working.
Fixed mirv_pgl draw corner cases (extreme values) that could lead to rounding error problems.
Fixed mirv_streams bug, due to change in code not always swapping buffers before next stream is rendered, causing state problems in material system.
Fixed mirv_pgl draw not working after ALT+TAB and bugs in the encoder, also changed encoding scheme a bit to have am exact value for 0, sample is in misc/MirvPglDrawTest/.
Updated the build with the latest Visual Studio 2017 version / UCRT / ....
Fixed mirv_streams record presentOnScreen 1.
Added timecode to mirv_pgl draw. Sample is in misc/MirvPglDrawTest/.
Added mirv_pgl draw. Sample is in misc/MirvPglDrawTest/.
Fixed a possible crash in CSSV34 upon startup, thanks to https://twitter.com/xKrasheR for helping with testing. (Crash on shutdown remains unfixed.)

Adjusted to latest CS:GO update:
Fixed mirv_streams sound recording not working.

Added mirv_voice record / mirv_streams record voices commands (you can use the one your prefer), allow writing of player voice in CS:GO into separate files. The voice delay can be controlled with mirv_voice record timePadding (default is game value of 0.2).
If you want the game sound withou the voices you can use: sv_cheats 1; snd_setmixer voip vol 0; (The default vol is 0.7.)
Added mirv_voice block command, allows blocking of player voice in CS:GO.

Updated AGR export:
For CS:GO: recordViewmodels doesn't require recordInvisible anymore, however all viewmodels and their parts will be marked as always visible for now.
Updated AGR to version 4 (is frame based now, which solves quite a few problems, also the import plugin(s) have several bug-fixes).

Added AGR support for CSSV34. Thanks to fuze ( https://twitter.com/over_fuze ) for helping with developement and testing. Also thanks to Contrastniy ( https://twitter.com/Contrastniy )for helping find the right Source SDK (2006).

Adjusted to 9/14/2017 CS:GO update:
Fixed Problem in addresses.cpp:261, caused mirv_streams sound recording not working.
Fixed infinite loop in mirv_cmd when using ticks and using the demoui previous tick button (as noted somewhere else, you should not use the tick buttons in demoui, those are bugged).

Updated to AGR version 3: Allows model-reuse for import tools, enabled player attachments in CS:GO, added sub-options recordViewmodel (not recommended, enter without options for reasons, needs recordInvisible, default 0 (off)) and recordInvisible (not recommended, since it will record trash data, even though the AGR 3 import tools try to dampen it a bit, default 0 (off)).

Adjusted to 8/17/2017 CS:GO update:
Fixed Problem in addresses.cpp:1363, affected mirv_fix blockObserverTarget.

Added mirv_cmd addTick (mirv_cmd now supports ticks), also minor improvements, the commands will be executed as early as possible, however please note that the actual result tick and time depend on your frame rate (since there can be multiple demo ticks per frame).

Adjusted to 8/7/2017 CS:GO update:
Fixed mirv_streams sound recording not working (please note: for technical reasons the sound will be mute during recording).
Updated AGR version to 2 (fixes some bugs).

Added mirv_agr command (in CS:GO you can still use the mirv_streams record agr one), which additionally to CS:GO also supports TF2 now.
Please note: The AGR support in TF2 is roughly the same as in CS:GO and since the medigun uses particles, those are of course missing.
Fixed mirv_calcs handle key calc: Should now defer the screen player side correctly (added a new hook into the CS:GO client.dll for that).

Fixed AfxHookSource not working with TF2 at all (even those commands that should work) and similar Source engine games. Please note: This will not fix L4D2 and GMOD, this is a different issue (interface name collision / wrong interface layout in AfxHookSource for those games).
Fixed mirv_streams record exporting 2 additional empty audio channels per WAV file.

Added own audio recording to mirv_streams, since Valve's startmovie wav audio is still broken. Please note: It is yet unknown if this works on all Windows operating systems, it might not work i.e. when DirectSound is used instead of XAudio2. Also please note that it's not possible to mix exactly the length of the recording, up to 12 ms might be missing at the end of the recording.
Exposed matPostprocessEnable, matDynamicTonemapping, matMotionBlurEnabled to mirv_streams record.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed mirv_aim point [...] not working correctly, thanks to https://twitter.com/solomvm .

release.comments: ATTENTION: mirv_streams audio recordings will result into an empty (44 Bytes) .WAV file, just like for startmovie, because Valve accidentally removed important code from startmovie for appending the audio data. In case Valve fixes that problem, you will need to close the console for the audio being recorded until an further HLAE update, because HLAE won't know the hooks yet for the console open check.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Adjusted to 7/7/2017 CS:GO update.

release.comments: ATTENTION: mirv_streams audio recordings will result into an empty (44 Bytes) .WAV file, just like for startmovie, because Valve accidentally removed important code from startmovie for appending the audio data. In case Valve fixes that problem, you will need to close the console for the audio being recorded until an further HLAE update, because HLAE won't know the hooks yet for the console open check.

changes.change: Fixed mirv_cam using wrong angles in case the calcVecAng doesn't return successfully.
Fixed mirv_streams and their actions not being properly freed.
Fixed mirv_camio import quaternions for rotation not always being the shortest path.
Added mirv_record agr recordProjectiles, allows to control recording of i.e. grenades separately from weapons.
Updated mirv_streams record agr: now also exports projectiles (i.e. thrown grenades).

Updated mirv_streams record agr to version 1. Now also exports weapons (expiremental) and camera by default. What is exported can be controlled with mirv_streams record agr sub-commands, the more is enabled, the longer importing will take! Also AGR file size has been reduced. Requires the updated AGR import plugins for importing of course.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Added mirv_calcs.
Added mirv_calc support to mirv_cam source.
Added mirv_calc support to mirv_aim.

release.comments:
The system is pretty advanced and complex (please use the built-in command help and some guessing, also notice the vacAng or calc can be very helpful), here is an example (to get valid attachments you need to look at the model source code (.qc), examples are primary / facemask on players, muzzle_flash on guns, weapon_hand_R / camera_inventory / camera_buymenu on knifes and guns):
mirv_calcs handle add key key0 0
mirv_calcs vecAng add handleAttachment key0 key0 facemask
mirv_calcs vecAng add value ofsFaceMask 67 0 0 0 0 179.9
mirv_calcs vecAng add offset ofsKey0 key0 ofsFaceMask 1
mirv_cam source calcVecAng ofsKey0

changes.change: Fixed mirv_aim crashing under some conditions.
Added mirv_cam, allows offseting in local space and grab the source angles and position of an entity (by handle) or one of it's attachments.
Updated mirv_pgl to version 2, read header file prop/AfxHookSource/MirvPgl.h for more info as always.
Fixed materials being hold on for too long (until level change), which caused out of memory errors (csgo.exe crash), when mirv_streams was active a long time.
Fixed various bugs, that went through unnoticed so far.
Fixed potential mistake in caching of mirv_streams actions that could affect actionFilter usage.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Updated mirv_streams: Imporved preformance (for live preview of streams).
Updated build environment to Visual Studio 2017.

release.comments: Thanks to https://twitter.com/VisualStudio for hinting that std::shared_timed_mutex is available even when targeting Windows XP in VC++ 2017 (wanted to use std::shared_mutex originally, which is not available then).

changes.change: Updated mirv_streams actionFilter: actionFilter decisions are now cached too to improve performance.
Updated mirv_pgl to version 1. For more info see prop/AfxHookSource/MirvPgl.h header file in source code.
Added mirv_pgl (version 0), for more usage info see prop/AfxHookSource/MirvPgl.h header file in source code.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change:
Adjusted to 5/18/2017 CS:GO update:
Fixed error "addresses.cpp:1290", which would affect mirv_fix playerAnimState.

release.comments: Please note: The towers on mirage being grey on high or very high shader settings is not an HLAE bug, it's a CS:GO bug.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed mirv_fix playerAnimState not working.
Fixed smoke overlay always missing / mirv_streams stream property smokeOverlayAlphaFactor not working.

Fixed new commands mirv_camio and mirv_streams record cam not working properly (those are custom files somewhat similar to bvh, but with time and FOV info, atm there are no plugins that support importing them, but it shouldn't be too hard).

release.comments:
Please note: The towers on mirage being grey on high or very high shader settings is not an HLAE bug, it's a CS:GO bug.
Plesae report any new problems with HLAE that are not known yet.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Adjusted to 5/12/2017 CS:GO update.

release.comments:
Please note: The towers on mirage being grey on high or very high shader settings is not an HLAE bug, please report it to Valve instead.
Plesae report any new problems with HLAE that are not known yet:
Known Problems: New commands mirv_camio and mirv_streams record cam don't work yet.

changes.change: Fixed hlae_log_LibraryHooksA.txt and hlae_log_LibraryHooksW.txt debug files being written to csgo.exe folder (you can remove them if you want).
Adjusted to 5/3/2017 CS:GO update.
Adjusted to 4/12/2017 CS:GO update.
Fixed mirv_snd_timescale not working due to CS:GO update.
Adjusted afx/wh.cfg to new models (can be loaded as before with exec afx/wh).
Fixed mirv_fix playerAnimState related console spam (now every 10 seconds maximum).
Added mirv_fix playerAnimState, please see https://github.com/ripieces/advancedfx/wiki/Source%3ASmoother-Demos .
Adjusted to 3 Feb 2017 CS:GO update.
Fixed mirv_deathmsg highLightId not working anymore due to CS:GO update.
Added HLAE wildcard support to mirv_streams edit (you can edit multiple streams at once, in case they are compatible).
Added mirv_fix physicsMaxFps, allows to raise / set the FPS limit for physics (i.e. rag dolls, so they don't freeze upon high host_framerate).
Minor fixes (i.e. changed enable to enabled in some mirv_ sub commands for higher command convergence (old version is silently supported)).

release.name: AfxHookSource
release.comments: No relevant changes.

changes.change: Fixed shader register number used for overrideColor and overrideBlend options of replace based actions (which many are).

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed mistakes in d3d9 related code, causing invalid / unwanted render states (could cause i.e. missing decals textures etc.).
Added actionFilter addEx property on baseFx streams for actionFilter (takes i.e. entity handle as option).
Added picker property on baseFx streams, allows finding visible entity handle(s) / material(s).
Various minor fixes.

release.comments: Advanced excercise for you: Try to use the new features to hide only the shadow of exactly one alive player.

changes.change: Fixed Problem in addresses.cpp:402 error (affected mirv_replace_name).
Fixed mirv_streams edit causing to hang the whole game when editing a stream that was recorded / in preview and had attachCommands / detachCommands. Thanks to https://twitter.com/DanielZ1337 .

Added mirv_vpanel command for testing. It's probably not useful and thus not planned to stay. An example for it would be
mirv_streams edit streamNameHere attachCommands "mirv_vpanel hide HudZoom"
This will hide the scope overlay of the Hud and leave the other HUD untouched.
Fixed typo in afx/wh.cfg causing the per stream shouldForceNoVisOverride option not to be set to 1.

Updated afx/wh.cfg to give maximum wallhack: Added special commands r_occlusion 0 and r_portalsopenall 1 (unlocked with mirv_cvar_unhide_all) to the config, thanks to twitter.com/over_fuze for helping to find them.

Adjusted to 28 Nov 2016 CS:GO update / fixed Error addresses.cpp:1528 (removed non-required shader hooking code (non-required, because Valve ignored our requests for updated stdshader source code since Februrary :( )).

Added shouldForceNoVisOverride to mirv_streams edit for baseFx based streams (which most are). When set to 1 specifies visibility extension (disabling of visiblity checks) per stream (still not perfect, but okay I guess) and replaces the r_novis console variable method, that would affect all streams and thus could have unwanted side-effects. The afx/wh cfg was updated accordingly, people with custom cfgs might need to add this new setting to their cfgs.

Fixed mirv_streams crashes due to material creation and class variable initialization issues. Moved material initialization onto the main thread, because it seems the CS:GO material system FindMaterial function can crash when called from different threads, especially when called at the same time.
Fixed ripieces/advancedfx#28 : mirv_campath edit start delta+/delta- sub-commands not working correctly.
Fixed mirv_campath edit interp rotation, expecting cubic instead of intended sCubic, thanks to cZF.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed mirv_deathmsg mem remove sub command not working.
Added mirv_fix oldDuckFix, requested by @gsrqq. Can fix player stuck in duck for older demos without losing sound like the old method - unwanted side effects currently unknown or none.

release.comments:
What would you like to see next in HLAE?
You can tell us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/dtugend/status/794921631525310464
Or on the forum: http://advancedfx.style-productions.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=17&t=1877

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Added mirv_deathmsg fake sub command. Suggest by several people, including @C9Calle. I didn't want to add it, because last time we did that for GoldSrc engine, we caused a lot of fakes, but it has been requested several times now and more importantly, GOTV demos can miss player_death game event messages (used for the death notification), because those are not transmitted realibaly.

release.comments:
What would you like to see next in HLAE?
You can tell us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/dtugend/status/794921631525310464
Or on the forum: http://advancedfx.style-productions.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=17&t=1877

changes.change: Fixed hang / crash i.e. on Windows XP upon startup (moved thread synchcronization out of being run during DllMain).
Added mirv_input mem sub command, allows to store, use, save and load states (view position, angles and fov) when using mirv_input camera. (Requested by cZF.)
Fixed mirv_streams property smokeOverlayAlphaFactor not working properly. Fix was a bit tricky, but it should work now :-)

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: This should fix a lot of crashes: fixed AfxHookSource render context call queue wrapping causing a memory leak among other things due to a typo (wrong variable name) (already wrapped queues weren't detected most of the time due to that and wrapped again).

release.comments: Please report any new HLAE problems you didn't experience before AfxHookSource 1.7.1 / the 28 Oct 2016 CS:GO update!

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Added mirv_fix blockObserverTarget - For CS:GO only, fixes unwanted player switching (spec lag/spin) i.e. upon bomb plant (blocks C_BasePlayer::RecvProxy_ObserverTarget).

release.comments: Please report any new HLAE problems you didn't experience before AfxHookSource 1.7.1 / the 28 Oct 2016 CS:GO update!

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Adjusted interface name to newer CS:GO VEngineClient018 version.

release.comments: This is a quick hack, things might have slipped through / there might be still new problems. Please report any new problems!

changes.change: Fixed alphaMatteEntity streams not working, thanks to https://twitter.com/Barabulyko

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Many changes under the hood, i.e. HLAE is now handling mat_queue_mode (mutli threading / queueing) and thus hopefully less bugs.

Issue 22 fixed, by telling the materialsystem to end frame and begin new frame, otherwise it would have too much on the IMatRenderContext queue and run out of memory and thus HLAE would crash the game.

release.comments: Please report new bugs / errors you encounter, due to the many changes, new bugs are possible!

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed error Problem in addressescpp:392, which affected mirv_replace_name. (Backported from sourceStreamFixes branch.)

Fixed mistake in asmClassTools.h with the class pointer (wrong offset), which will cause trouble in cases where those JMP_..._OFS... functions are used with a non-zero offset (I.e. can cause crashes on CAfxMesh::IndexCount). (Backported from sourceStreamFixes branch.)

release.comments: Please report errors / bugs, that HLAE didn't have before the update in the HLAE / advancedfx.org forum, because some changes affecting HLAE might have slipped through, thanks. Thanks to psh.

changes.change: Fixed HLAE not working on Windows XP.
Fixed mirv_streams being affected by Valve's super duper ConVar value cheat protection (I hope they don't start a stupid cat and mice game here that HLAE will lose and real cheats will keep up with).
Adjusted to 5th Aug 2016 CS:GO update.
Adjusted to 3rd Aug 2016 CS:GO update. Please report things that worked before and might not work yet (some things might have slipped through.)
Fixed mirv_streams record agr command: newly created entities could slip through in their first frame (causing i.e. rag dolls to display a frame too late).

Improved mirv_streams record agr command (game state recording in CS:GO, still in developement), now tracks entity deletions. Can be imported with https://github.com/ripieces/afx-sfm-scripts version 1.2.0 or newer into Source FilmMaker.
Added mirv_streams record agr command (still in developement). For testing game state recording in CS:GO. Can be imported with https://github.com/ripieces/afx-sfm-scripts into Source FilmMaker.
Added mirv_streams previewEnd command to make scripting easier.
Added mirv_streams record startMovieWav 0|1 (default 1), when enabled automatically uses startmovie/endmovie to capture a WAV file to the take folder.

Added mirv_streams record bvh, allows to control recording of HLAE BVH camera motion data files for main camera and multiple entities at once (You can use mirv_listentites or voice_show_mute for a list of entity / player indexes).
Testing workaround for UCRT problems with SetDllDirectory (using SetCurrentDirectory instead).
Updated build environment to Visual Studio 2015, should still run on Windows XP (target is v140_xp).
Fixed mirv_input camera input focus loss detection (i.e. on ALT_TAB) (now uses WM_ACTIVATE message instread), thanks to anthony.
Added smoother aiming (using a 2nd order motion profile) to mirv_aim (disabled by default, to enable enter mirv_aim snapTo 0).
Updated smoke texture and materials used by afx/wh config (enter exec afx/wh into console to load the config), thanks to Suky.

Reintegrated updateWorkaround into mirv_streams add (meaning you can add stream templates more easily again, no need to use the afx/updateWorkaround config). Of course this still has the usual limitations due to the 17 Feb 2016 CS:GO update :-(
Fixed mirv_input camera input focus loss detection (i.e. on ALT_TAB) (now uses WM_ACTIVATE message instread), thanks to anthony.
Added smoother aiming (using a 2nd order motion profile) to mirv_aim (disabled by default, to enable enter mirv_aim snapTo 0).
Updated smoke texture and materials used by afx/wh config (enter exec afx/wh into console to load the config), thanks to Suky.

Reintegrated updateWorkaround into mirv_streams add (meaning you can add stream templates more easily again, no need to use the afx/updateWorkaround config). Of course this still has the usual limitations due to the 17 Feb 2016 CS:GO update :-(

release.name: AfxHookSource lite

changes.change: Added mirv_camimport toCamPath - enter mirv_camimport for more help on the command.
Added mirv_listentites - Very basic list of current entities, enter the command for more help.

Added mirv_aim - Overrides the camera angles and points the camera at a target, enter the command for more help. The aiming is currently not smooth (snaps to the target), sorry for disobeying the Twitter poll, but the mirv_camimport toCamPath feature was urgent and mirv_aim is already a bit implemented.
Added mirv_cmd - For timed command execution, it's not superior to Valve's demoui PlayCommands appart from being able to save and load (XML format), enter the command for more help.

release.comments:
For those that don't know, AfxHookSource lite has rudimentary mirv_streams support (but still no proper support again and Valve didn't reply so far), see: http://advancedfx.style-productions.net/forum/viewtopic.php?p=5475#p5475
Also you can find us on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/dtugend

release.name: AfxHookSource lite

changes.change: Added mirv_campath edit interp options and added support for linear interpolation (works with 2 keyframes already). I doubt this is useful but it was requested.

release.comments:
For those that don't know, AfxHookSource lite has rudimentary mirv_streams support (but still no proper support again and Valve didn't reply so far), see: http://advancedfx.style-productions.net/forum/viewtopic.php?p=5475#p5475
Also you can find us on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/dtugend

release.name: AfxHookSource lite

changes.change: Fixed mirv_streams noDraw action not working, because I forgot to comment in code again (stupid me!).

release.comments:
For those that don't know, AfxHookSource lite has rudimentary mirv_streams support (but still no proper support again and Valve didn't reply so far), see: http://advancedfx.style-productions.net/forum/viewtopic.php?p=5475#p5475
Also you can find us on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/dtugend
Also read the previous release notes here: https://github.com/ripieces/advancedfx/releases

release.name: AfxHookSource lite

changes.change: Added mirv_streams record presentOnScreen. Allows to turn on on-screen preview (where applicable) during recording (Not recommended, might cause epileptic seizures, thus default is off!).

Added forcing of mat_force_tonemap_scale to 1.0 during recording with mirv_streams record for better results (i.e. no more random brightness on bomb plant etc.). Can be controlled through mirv_streams record matForceTonemapScale.

Fixed incorrect tracking of i.e. D3DRS_ALPHABLENDENABLE state due to CS:GO using Direct3D9 state blocks (IDirect3DStateBlock9), which could i.e. cause elements to be missing from screen, when using actions that change the Direct3D9 render state (i.e. noDraw action). Thanks to anthony for providing a demo with the bug being reproduceable!
Fixed mirv_streams not de-referencing actions properly when a stream was removed (caused actions to not be removeable due to wrongly reported dependencies).

release.comments:
For those that don't know, AfxHookSource lite has rudimentary mirv_streams support (but still no proper support again and Valve didn't reply so far), see: http://advancedfx.style-productions.net/forum/viewtopic.php?p=5475#p5475
Also you can find us on Twitter here: https://twitter.com/dtugend

release.name: AfxHookSource lite

changes.change: Added support for really old engine version (i.e. CSS 1.0.0.34). To enable it add -afxV34 to the command line options in Custom Loader (case sensitive).

release.comments: Thanks to Contrastniy for helping with debugging.

release.name: AfxHookSource lite

changes.change:
Added a cfg with RUDIMENTARY matte/depth streams support, enter
exec afx/updateWorkaround
into console once and read instructions on stream.

release.comments:
We'd like to bring you better streams as they were before again, but that might be very difficult without the updated shader source (there were heavy changes and additions to those shaders we used to hook).
If you want to support us with asking Valve for help, follow us i.e. on Twitter: https://twitter.com/dtugend

release.name: AfxHookSource lite

changes.change:
Updated AfxHookSource to work with the 17 Feb 2016 CS:GO update.
I called this AfxHookSource lite version, because you won't be able to use matte / depth / alpha streams or actions related to those. It might take quite a while until those features work as good as they did before again, because Valve updated the shaders that HLAE partially hooks with replacement shaders and there is no proper source code available (closest is still the old Alien Swarm SDK) and I don't know yet how complicated their new changes / additions are.
All other features should hopefully work (even the new easy wallhack effect added in AfxHookSource 1.1).

release.comments:
Please note that the game can crash for AMD users, which is not the fault of HLAE:
https://www.reddit.com/r/AMDHelp/comments/46d193/counterstrike_global_offensive_operation_wildfire/

changes.change: Added several options to mirv_streams actions add replace.
Added smokeOverlayAlphaFactor to mirv_streams baseFx based streams.

Added easy on-screen wallhack config complete with material and texture files.
This is really easy, just enter the following into console (will print help):
exec afx/wh
This also serves as sample how to use the new features added recently (just have a look at the files in the resources folder).
Fixed mirv_streams actions being case sensitive in some cases (now are fully non-case sensitive again).
Fixed mirv_streams missing invisible action, which can be a problem for users still relaying on it, however it's actually just a noDraw action these days.

Fixed mirv_streams actions like mask/drawDepth/white/... having problems with Sprite_DX9 shader (those actions will fallback to noDraw action for this shader now, should mostly affect light glows etc. only).

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Added mirv_fov handleZoom, which allows to enable zoom handling for mirv_fov (so it doesn't override the fov when zoomed). For CS:GO you only need to do mirv_fov handleZoom enabled 1. For other mods not using a default 90.0 fov you might need to set the threshold with mirv_fov handleZoom minUnzoomedFov.
Updated mirv_streams heavily to support mirv_streams actions.

Added a mirv_streams actions, which is the ability to add custom actions that can be used as action for baseFx based streams (currently all streams except developer and normal stream). There is currently only on custom action to add, which is the replace action, which allows to define a replacement material for an action. While HLAE does basic checks if the material is compatible with the one replaced, there might still be console errors or even crashes, if the material is not compatible, so use with care.
The replace action basically replaces the material ("texture") of a model, but not the model itself. So pelase don't get too excited!

Added a actionFilter command to mirv_streams baseFx streams. Command has built-in help. It allows to filter by material name (even using wild cards) and set an action for that material. Be careful, for example replacing the vgui materials will mess up your console! (Well it mostly just does what you ask it to.)

Added otherAction to mirv_streams, this will hoepfully improve handling of unknown materials on custom maps for the various stream templates. (Also added a few readonly actions that are of no real use but used internally.)

release.comments:
For custom replacement materials it's a good idea to use the resources\AfxHookSource\assets\csgo\materials folder in the HLAE installation directory, because HLAE mounts the whole resources\AfxHookSource\assets\csgo folder into the game. That way you won't mess up your game. Since the HLAE mounted directory has lowest priority, you need to use a material name that is not already used for your custom materials, meaning the best idea is to place them in a custom sub-directory, i.e. resources\AfxHookSource\assets\csgo\materials\my.
Good luck, have fun, happy testing!

changes.change: Updated mirv_streams: Reduced potential for epileptic seizures upon recording again. (Now only main game view should be shown now, really.)

Added writeZAction in mirv_streams, this allows to properly remove level walls from drawing and blocking the view. Basically you add a alphaMatte and an alphaEntity stream and set for each stream the writeZAction to noDraw (this removes the clip planes from i.e. the level walls) and i.e. the worldTexturesAction, staticPropTexturesAction, otherModelsAction, cableAction, clientEffectTexturesAction, decalTexturesAction, effectsAction, otherParticleAction, errorMaterialAction, weaponModelsAction to noDraw and set the r_novis console variable to 1 (to disable the visbility checks). Also on de_dust2 you might need to use a special depth stream in order to mask what I call the castle in the sky, which is basically a far away version of de_dust2 (doesn't happen on other maps usually, you can use the fact that's it further away than 16384 inches)). We'll try to make a tutorial and link it here: TUTORIAL INK TBA
Exposed errorMaterialAction in mirv_streams.
Updated mirv_streams noDraw action to be more aggressive, it should work on all materials now.
Removed mirv_streams invisible action. It's still accepted as valid input, but will be mapped to noDraw instantly.

Added depthF and depthFZIP capture types to mirv_streams: Those are the preferred capture types for OpenEXR / high precision depth captures now. However they might require a quite recent graphic card in order to work.
Example:
mirv_streams add depth myDepthF
mirv_streams edit myDepthF depthValMax 8192
mirv_streams edit myDepthF captureType depthF
Fixed depth24 action: No alpha blending anymore, that would lead to inaccurate results, (binary) alpha testing instead.
Updated mirv_streams: Reduced potential for epileptic seizures upon recording. (Only main game view should be shown now and it might jump between two succeeding frames a bit.)

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed huge OpenEXR / depth24 export inaccuracies due to a wrong formular causing huge problems in precision dependant post processing. Please also read the comments at the end of this changelog entry.
Fixed the on-screen drawing of the campath (mirv_campath draw) being off by one frame (hardly noticeable).
Renamed mirv_streams stattrackAction to statTrakAction (old spelling will still be accepted).

release.comments:
Please note: It is highly recommended to turn off in-game Anti Aliasing when using depth24 / OpenEXR support, because several anti aliasing methods used are not neutral to the colour hue.
Also please note, while the export is named depth24, the actual accuracy is 23 bits maximum. Depending on your garphic card and drivers the accuracy can be much lower, however with modern cards and drivers you should be close to the 23 bit maximum accuracy.

changes.change:
Added depth24 (OpenEXR) support to mirv_streams, example commands to add a depth24 stream:
mirv_streams add depth mydepth24
mirv_streams edit mydepth24 depthValMax 8192.0
mirv_streams edit mydepth24 mod toDepth24
If you want to have the OpenEXR files with ZIP compression (probably slower) use toDepth24ZIP instead of toDepth24.
Fixed missing code causing SplineRope based materials to not work properly with mirv_streams anymore.

Fixed mirv_streams affecting the HUD. Currently mirv_streams should not affect the HUD (if working properly). Maybe in future updates we will handle the HUD too with replacement shaders, but not for now.

Added mirv_deathmsg modTime - allows to set a multiplier value for displaytime of a deathmessage, it is smilar to mirv_deathmsg block, except that it takes an additional argument (floating point value) for the multiplier (a negative multiplier value will make it behave like mirv_deathmsg block). The resulting display time for a matched notification is [mirv_deathmsg cfg noticeLifeTime] * [multiplier value].
Fixed problems with AfxHookSource 0.2.8.0.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Added mirv_skip, allows to skip approximate demo ticks / demo time (front-end to demo_gototick command).

Updated the mirv_streams system: It's far more accurate in many cases now, because it comes with replacement shaders for SplineRope, SpriteCard, VertexLitGeneric (only non-bumped and non-phong shaders atm) and UnlitGeneric (only non-bumped and non-phong shaders atm) and also uses UnlitGeneric as fallback material shader now. Please note that the installation size increased heavily due to the shaders (196MB increase).

release.comments:
Please note: advancedfx.org recommends using alphaWorld and alphaMatteEntity (alphaMatte + alphaEntity) stream above matteWorld and matteEntity stream, since those are far superior!
TODO: Add OpenEXR support for supporting the new depth24 action (24 bit depth streams export).

changes.change: Fixed render state problems once and for all hopefully (i.e. with D3DRS_SRGBWRITEENABLE state causing i.e. black console): The render state or vertex / pixel shader constants overrides should now be properly transparent to the game (meaning the Get* actions will feed the game with its own original values).
Fixed mirv_streams console warning / error spam about missing afx_* shaders that were not used anyway (unless you had set the hidden testAction to 1).
Fixed and re-added forcing of D3DRS_SRGBWRITEENABLE state for mirv_streams actions that require it (should fix i.e. wrong console colour).

Added mirv_streams action stattrackAction for baseFx based streams (which most stream types except normal currently are). Allows to fine tune the streams behaviour for the Stattrack weapon module and i.e. allows to make it invisible ( mirv_streams edit streamNameHere stattrackAction invisible ).
Updated AfxHookSource: Adjusted to 9th Dec 2015 CS:GO update (affects mirv_deathmsg).
Updated AfxHookSource: Adjusted addresses according to 10th Nov 2015 CS:GO update. Also improved detection of m_skybox3d.scale to be more stable against CS:GO updates.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Updated mirv_deathmsg highLightId: now works more POV demo alike: if the highlighted player dies the background is red.
Added mirv_deathmsg highLightAssister: Whether or not to highlight kill assists for highLightId.

release.comments:
Just so you know spddl released v1.0.0 of MMHud (the MovieMaker Hud to be used with HLAE).
You can get it from here: http://mmhud.spddl.de/
He is waiting for feedback, you should contact him here: https://twitter.com/spddlde or http://www.spddl.de

changes.change: Fixed mirv_streams: Adjusted m_SkyBox3d.scale offset address according to 20th Oct 2015 CS:GO update, important for proper 3D skybox scaling in depth dump.
Added properties position, angles and fov to mirv_input, that can be used to set position / view angles / fov directly when in mirv_input camera mode.

Updated ScaleformUI override features. Will be documented in HLAE Manual as soon as appropiate - we are in contact with spddl.de regarding a special movie maker GUI :-) (HLAE will automatically redirect requests from the game's folder csgo\resource\flash to a sub-folder path relative to HLAE.exe called resources\AfxHookSource\assets\csgo\resource\afxFlash, but only if the file requested exists in the folder structure requested.)

Added feature that overrides the ScaleformUI SWF file checksum checks, so you should be able to use custom HUDs / heavily customize your HUD. I am currently trying to contact someone that does custom HUDs in order to work out, if a special movie maker HUD can be made, but I am not in contact yet, let's see.
Fixed mirv_streams: Now forces motion blur off, in order to avoid problems with it (The motion blur is not good anyway, you should add it in post production, if you want any.).
Added options to mirv_campath edit start: You can now give an absolute value or an delta value, enter mirv_campath edit into console for further help.

Fixed mirv_streams: Epileptic seizures are back, because off-screen rendering doesn't work well for streams that want the HUD to be drawn (drawHud 1), because the ScaleformUI doesn't obey the render target.
Added attachCommands and detachCommands properties to mirv_streams stream properties (allows executing commands when the stream is attached / detached), use at your own risk!
Add mirv_deathmsg highLightId - allows to disable frag highlighting or to set for which player id to highlight.
Add mirv_snd_filter.
Updated mirv_streams: alphaMatte and alphaEntity defaults (and thus alphaMatteEntity defaults) changed.
Fixed mirv_streams edit not working properly in AfxHookSource 0.2.5.0.
Updated mirv_streams record to give you less epileptic seizures (images are rendered off-screen now).
Added alphaMatteEntity twin stream to mirv_streams, basically an entity stream with alpha channel (dumped in TGA format only).
Adjusted AfxHookSource to 24th September 2015 CS:GO update (Affected depth stream skybox elements scaling, due to changes in CBasePlayer object.).
Added several options for fine tuning mirv_input behaviour to mirv_input cfg.
Updated mirv_streams: matteEntity stream clientEffectTexturesAction now defaults to noDraw in order to avoid problems with keying due to glow textures.
Fixed TGA file output header, which could cause problems i.e. in FFmpeg.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed mirv_streams: Fixed D3DRS_SRGBWRITEENABLE FALSE state forcing, it's now on again on all stream actions that relay on it (depth, matte, black, white), since we can't relay on the engine at all to do it properly.

release.comments: Okay, hopefully this is the last fix of that type, at least for today :( Sorry. Happy testing, loool :D

changes.change: Fixed mirv_streams: Fixed D3DRS_SRGBWRITEENABLE state forcing (now forces the state both through IShaderShadow and manually, because the engine doesn't always update the state but still tracks it internally and updates it sometimes).
Fixed mirv_streams: Adjusted m_SkyBox3d.scale offset address according to CS:GO update, important for proper 3D skybox scaling in depth dump.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed mirv_streams: Fixed D3DRS_SRGBWRITEENABLE state forcing (now goes through IShaderShadow API and only for DebugDepth shader, so that shader state should get maintained by engine more properly), no more random colours and brightness hopefully.

release.comments: Oh boy was AfxHookSource 0.2.4.1 bugged, sorry for releasing it :/

changes.change: Updated mirv_streams: Now handles error material (some fences on de_overpass have that currently).
Updated mirv_streams: Added alphaMatte, alphaEntity and alphaWorld streams (If you need alphaWorld depends on what you want to do.).

Updated mirv_streams: Most actions force D3DRS_SRGBWRITEENABLE state as required, to avoid random color states caused by the engine i.e. when decals are drawn in-between (until now only drawDepth action had this).
Updated mirv_streams record: The recorded stream FOV will now match the game FOV.
Updated mirv_streams record name: is now a folder name, can be a full folder path (i.e. d:\myFoldeName). Default value is untitled_rec, which is a folder created where the csgo.exe is located.
Updated mirv_streams record: Take sub-folders will be automatically created in the folder specified by mirv_streams record name. The streams will go into sub-folders of the take folder accordingly.
Added mirv_streams record format: Can be tga (default) or bmp.
Added mirv_streams edit options for all streams: drawHud (default is 0), drawViewmodel (default is 1).

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed mirv_streams not handling auto bound materials in IMatRenderContext functions GetDynamicMesh and GetDynamicMeshEx.

release.comments: No HLAE problems with the latest 15th September 2015 CS:GO Update were found so far.

changes.change: Fixed a mistake in code that should not affect users.

Fixed mirv_streams screen flashing due to histogram adaption. For now HLAE will force mat_dynamic_tonemapping 0 when using mirv_streams until there is more fine grained RenderView access. Thanks to suky for providing a demo and cfg with the problem.
Fixed mirv_streams models or other content flashing black due to color modulation render state (happened on de_cache a lot for example). Thanks to FGW for providing a demo with the problem.
Fixed mirv_input camera reacting even when input focus was lost (i.e. due to ALT+TAB).
Fixed game visuals becoming inresponsive after graphic device was lost (i.e. due to alt-tabbing out of fullscreen) after mirv_campath draw had been enabled earlier.
Fixed bug in conversion between quaternion and quake engine view angles that could cause wrong campath camera view angles epsecially when the camera was rolled.
Fixed mirv_campath edit rotate to update the view angles also, otherwise it's not useful.

Added mirv_cvar_hack (for CS:GO only) - allows forcing values for some cvars (not cmds) directly, use with caution! Please note: currently there will be neither an error (if you do a typo) nor an success message.
Fixed / improved accuracy of demo tick display in mirv_campath print.
Fixed help text of mirv_campath edit for mirv_campath edit position not being accurate.
Fixed small memory / object leak in mirv_campath edit functions when a proper subset of points was selected.
Updated mirv_campath edit position: If multiple keyframes are selected the movement now applies to the middle of their bounding box (which hopefully is more useful for users).
Added mirv_campath edit options for editing position, rotation and FOV of selected keyframes or even rotating all or selected keyframes.
Updated and clarified time codes for mirv_campath print and mirv_campath select.
Added displaying of approximate demo tick for each keyframe to mirv_campath print.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Added mirv_campath draw support for CS:S (Counter-Strike Source) and similar Source SDK 2013 based games. Please let us know if it works in your mod too :-)

release.comments: We noticed during mirv_campath draw development, that data exported by mirv_camexport might be off (not accurate enough). If you used the data in a 3D program and can check whether or not there is a problem when syncing it to game footage, please let us know!

changes.change: Fixed LU decomposition finally, might affect very rare cases of mirv_campath draw drawing.
Bug in LU-decomposition pivotisation fixed causing bugs in line clipping. Other minor fixes.
Bug fixes mostly related to drawing.
Added mirv_campath draw. This _might_ work in other modifications than CS:GO too.
Added mirv_campath select.

Added mirv_streams officially (renamed from __mirv_streams). The system still has it's limitations, but is now in a state where it makes sense to offer it to more users. A few examples for this command will be added to the HLAE Manual hopefully.

Fixed crashes due to class pointer not being offset according to used interface in case of multiple inheritance in CAfxMesh (IMesh wrapper). Thanks to the great and mighty anthony for providing a demo with the problem.
Updated mirv_fov, when enabled it now has a higher priority and is only superseded by mirv_input camera and otherwise supersedes any other FOV setting (i.e. by the game or mirv_campath).
Updated and fixed __mirv_streams a bit. Depth streams are still heavily bugged though, especially when using Effect Detail higher than Low.
Updated __mirv_streams.

Updated __mirv_streams: Better default behaviour for matteStreams now. Also exposed lots of matteStream settings to the console (use __mirv_streams edit), i.e. worldTexturesAction, skyBoxTexturesAction, staticPropTexturesAction, cableAction, playerModelsAction, weaponModelsAction, shellModelsAction, otherModelsAction, decalTexturesAction, effectsAction, shellParticleAction, otherParticleAction, stickerAction.
Fixed mirv_input camera sometimes reacting to mouse movements when console is open.
Increased default mirv_input cfg msens to 0.1.

Updated __mirv_streams: No need to copy (2) assets anymore, HLAE will mount them in the game file system instead. For more info about testing the matte system in a early stage refer to: http://advancedfx.style-productions.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=17&t=1693 Please be aware that __mirv_streams is for testing only and subject to change.
Adjusted AfxHookSource to 30th June 2015 CS:GO update.

Added mirv_gameoverlay command for lazy people (you know who you are) that allows to disable / enable the gameoverlay. This command is useful in AfxHookSource, since the gameoverlay will be recorded with startmovie otherwise. Please note that this will not disable Steam notification sounds, but those are not recorded by startmovie anyway.
Fixed mirv_input camera mouse being trapped in window for POV demos.
Added mirv_input for input control (i.e. of camera), the command will be documented in the HLAE Manual.
Adjusted AfxHookSource to 26th May 2015 CS:GO update.
Limited usable fov (Field Of View) range (affects mirv_fov and mirv_campath) to between 1 degree to 179 degrees.

Turns out Visual Studio 2010 SP1 was not properly installed on the build computer, reinstalled it and updated or rebuild all files included in the HLAE download accordingly. Hopefully this fixes some problems on Windows 8 some users are experiencing i.e. with AfxHookSource (but maybe not).

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Added mirv_fov, allows to override the games FOV (Field Of View). The features related to mirv_campath will now pick up and interpolate the FOV. Please note that for technical reasons mirv_camexport and mirv_camimport will ignore the FOV.

release.comments: Thanks to xyanide for suggesting this feature.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed mirv_deathmsg block not ORing the blocks in the list (the last one always determined the outcome).

release.comments: Thanks to tweeday for finding this bug.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed unitialized C++ class members leading to a crash when using mirv_campath edit functions.

release.comments: Thanks to xyanide for testing.

changes.change: Added mirv_snd_timescale. Allows to set the timescale for the sound system independently of host_timescale. Useful for GOTV demos with startmovie and high host_framerate where host_timescale 0 is required in order to avoid lag / skipping in recoding (set mirv_snd_timescale to 1.0).

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed random crashes i.e. when loading a differet demo.

release.comments: Thanks to flippoz for helping.

changes.change: Fixed mirv_cvar_unhide_all crashing.
Added mirv_cvar_unhide_all for CS:GO, which when executed unhides all cvars (inlcuding development cvars).

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Added mirv_campath for creating campaths easily. If there is a bug, then please save the campath using mirv_campath save test.xml (will go to the folder of the game.exe file) and report with that file.

release.comments: Thanks to James McEnnan for sharing qspline under the CC0 license and helping with problems!

changes.change: Made AfxHookSource / mirv_deathmsg more stable against minor CS:GO client.dll updates.
Added mirv_deathmsg for CS:GO. Please note this will break with the next CS:GO update and either needs to be updated or hardened againt further updates then.
Updated AfxHookSource to support 23 Apr 2014 CS:GO update.
Updated AfxHookSource to support 26 Mar 2014 CS:GO update.
Updated AfxHookSource to support 05 Feb 2014 CS:GO update.
Updated AfxHookSource to support CS:GO again.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed CS:GO crashing in some situations.

release.comments: Thanks and greetings to how-hiGh!

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Updated AfxHookSource to support more modifications for Camera Motion Data I/O. Also made AfxHookSource more stable against game updates. The exact Source engine modifications supported are unknown at the moment and need to be tested. Currently known to work: Counter-Strike:Source, Counter-Strike:Global Offensive. Please note: Currently CS:GO will crash when the demo end is reached, we couldn't fix this so far.

release.comments: Thanks and greetings to Dec and how-hiGh!

release.name: AfxHookSource

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Fixed cam motion file import.

release.comments: Thanks to chetaah.

changes.change: Removed mirv_allowcheats (sv_cheats always works in demos in Source).
Switched to VC100.

release.name: AfxHookSource

changes.change: Added mirv_allowcheats (cstrike, ep2), unblocks sv_cheats and related commands.
Extended mirv_camexport, mirv_camimport to work with ep2.

release.comments: Greetz / thx to msthavoc, Austin Killey, nemoic.

changes.change: Minor tweak in camimport to reduce rounding error.
Added mirv_camexport, mirv_camimport (Counter-Strike Source only).
First version.
